directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together Greek yogurt and milk until well combined. Mixture will thin out and become a pourable consistency.
Slice each raspberry in half lengthwise.
Insert sticks and pour about 1 ounce of the yogurt mixture into each of the molds, allow the mixture to freeze.
Add granola on each side of the sticks (about 1 ½ teaspoons per pop), pushing down with a chopstick if necessary. Pour yogurt base to the fill line.
Let freeze completely, breakfast to go!
title: Berry Breakfast Popsicle
